pages.text: The Modular Armor is, on it's own, not much, but when you install modules, it can become very powerful!$(br2)Color modules do not have recipes, you must find them in dungeons.
Module levels can be configured any way you want, go into the $(l)Controls$() menu and add a keybind to "Modular item configuration."
The modular workbench is used to install modules onto Modular Armor parts. Notice that installing modules cost time and some energy!
